name: node-red-node-youtube
description: A Node-RED node to access Youtube API.
readme: node-red-node-youtube ==================== Node-RED node that manipulates Youtube Data API. Install ------- Run the following command in the root directory of your Node-RED install npm install node-red-node-youtube Usage ----- Contains 3 Nodes that may be used together: Channels List - List a user's channels Playlist List - List a Channel Playlist(s) PlaylistItems List - List the Videos in a Playlist You will need a Google API Key in order to make use of the Nodes, see Creating API keys /n/n
